Simon Vass

I am the Technical Director of E-Tech Uganda Ltd http://www.etech.ug. A IT based in Kampala, Uganda. We specialize in Open Source solutions. In my spare time I am an active contributor to the Uganda Linux User Group http://www.linux.or.ug and help organize our monthly meetings.
